tika-s0402t34:2_1: Catukkanipātassa paṭhame anubodho pubbabhāgiyaṁ ñāṇaṁ, paṭivedho anubodhena abhisamayo.
tika-s0402t34:2_2: Tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako paṭivedho anubodhena vinā na hoti.
tika-s0402t34:2_3: Anubodho hi ekacco paṭivedhasambaddho, tadubhayābhāvahetukañca vaṭṭe saṁsaraṇaṁ, tasmā vuttaṁ pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘ananubodhā…pe…
tika-s0402t34:2_5: Paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena bhavato bhavantarūpagamanaṁ sandhāvanaṁ, aparāparaṁ cavanūpapajjanavasena sañcaraṇaṁ saṁsaraṇanti āha ‘‘bhavato’’tiādi.
tika-s0402t34:2_6: Sandhāvitasaṁsaritapadānaṁ kammasādhanataṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘mayā ca tumhehi cā’’ti paṭhamavikappe.
tika-s0402t34:2_7: Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvasādhanataṁ hadaye katvā ‘‘mamañceva tumhākañcā’’ti yathārutavaseneva vuttaṁ .
tika-s0402t34:2_8: Dīgharajjunā baddhasakuṇaṁ viya rajjuhattho puriso desantaraṁ taṇhārajjunā baddhaṁ sattasantānaṁ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṁ neti etāyāti bhavanetti.
tika-s0402t34:3_0: Vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaroti sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sakasantāne parasantāne ca vināsakaro abhāvakaro.
tika-s0402t34:3_2: Savāsanānaṁ kilesānaṁ samucchinnattā sātisayaṁ kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.
tika-s0402t34:6_3: Tena ca kalinā sukhaṁ na paṭilabhatīti tena aparādhena sukhaṁ na vindati.
tika-s0402t34:6_4: Nindiyappasaṁsāya hi pasaṁsiyanindāya ca samakova vipāko.
tika-s0402t34:6_5: Pasaṁsiyanindāti ca sampannaguṇaparidhaṁsanavasena pavattiyā mahāsāvajjatāya kaṭukataravipākā.
tika-s0402t34:6_6: Nindiyappasaṁsā pana kathaṁ tāya samavipākāti ce?
tika-s0402t34:6_7: Tasmiṁ avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresañca micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṁsiyena tassa sabbhāvakaraṇato ca.
tika-s0402t34:6_8: Lokepi hi asūraṁ sūrena samaṁ karonto gārayho hoti, pageva duppaṭipannaṁ suppaṭipannena samaṁ karontoti.
tika-s0402t34:6_10: Appamattakova kalīti diṭṭhadhammikattā sappaṭikārattā ca appamattako aparādho. Ayaṁ…pe…
tika-s0402t34:6_11: mahantataro kali katūpacitattā samparāyikattā appaṭikārattā ca.
tika-s0402t34:7_0: Nirabbudoti gaṇanāviseso esoti āha ‘‘nirabbudagaṇanāyā’’ti, satasahassaṁ nirabbudāti attho.
tika-s0402t34:7_2: Yatheva hi sataṁ satasahassānaṁ koṭi hoti, evaṁ sataṁ satasahassānaṁ koṭiyo pakoṭi nāma hoti, sataṁ satasahassānaṁ pakoṭiyo koṭipakoṭi, sataṁ satasahassakoṭipakoṭiyo nahutaṁ, sataṁ satasahassanahutāni ninnahutaṁ, sataṁ satasahassaninnahutāni ekaṁ abbudaṁ, tato vīsatiguṇitaṁ nirabbudaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:7_3: Yaṁ ariye garahanto nirayaṁ upapajjatīti ariye garahanto yaṁ nirabbudasaṅkhātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati, nirabbudoti ca pāṭiyekko nirayo natthi, avīcimhiyeva pana nirabbudagaṇanāya paccitabbaṭṭhānassetaṁ nāmaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:10_1: Pañcame anusotaṁ gacchatīti saṁsārasotassa anukūlabhāvena gacchati.
tika-s0402t34:10_4: Anāgāmī hi assaddhiyehi kāmarāgabyāpādehi akampaniyacittatāya tamhā lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma.
tika-s0402t34:10_7: Brāhmaṇoti bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇoti saṅkhaṁ gato khīṇāsavo.
tika-s0402t34:10_10: Sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenāti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena saddhimpi.
tika-s0402t34:10_15: Kiṁ pana te rudantā brahmacariyaṁ carantīti?
tika-s0402t34:10_16: Āma, kilesarodanena rodantā caranti nāma, sīlasampanno puthujjanabhikkhu ettheva saṅgahito.
tika-s0402t34:11_2: Chahākārehi pāragatoti abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, pahānapāragū, sacchikiriyāpāragū, samāpattipāragūti evaṁ chahi ākārehi sabbadhammānaṁ pāraṁ pariyosānaṁ gato.
tika-s0402t34:14_1: Chaṭṭhe appakaṁ sutaṁ hotīti navaṅgasatthusāsane kiñcideva sutaṁ hoti.
tika-s0402t34:14_5: Sagāthakañhi suttaṁ geyyaṁ, niggāthakaṁ suttaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:14_6: Tadubhayavinimuttañca suttaṁ udānādivisesasaññārahitaṁ natthi, yaṁ suttaṅgaṁ siyā.
tika-s0402t34:14_9: 261 ādayo) suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṁ viya .
tika-s0402t34:14_10: Geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya.
tika-s0402t34:17_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṁ sāmaññavidhi.
tika-s0402t34:17_6: nidānakathā) evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:17_7: Visesavidhayo pare sanimittā tadekadesesu geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
tika-s0402t34:17_9: Lokepi hi sasilokaṁ sagāthakaṁ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṁ ‘‘geyya’’nti vadanti.
tika-s0402t34:17_10: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṁ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:17_13: Evaṁ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṁ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṁ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-s0402t34:17_14: Nāpajjati geyyādisaññānaṁ anokāsabhāvato, ‘‘gāthāvirahe satī’’ti visesitattā ca.
tika-s0402t34:17_15: Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṁ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu ‘‘vuttaṁ heta’’ntiādīvacanasambandhesu abbhutadhammappaṭisaṁyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṁ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā, satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṁ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo.
tika-s0402t34:17_16: Yaṁ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṁ, taṁ suttaṅgaṁ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanato.
tika-s0402t34:17_17: Nanu ca sagāthakaṁ suttaṁ geyyaṁ, niggāthakaṁ suttaṁ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṁ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthāvāti?
tika-s0402t34:17_19: Sodhitañhi pubbe ‘‘gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimitta’’nti.
tika-s0402t34:18_1: ‘‘gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṁ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā’’ti, taṁ na, niruḷhattā.
tika-s0402t34:18_3: Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṁsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni, atha kho suttabhāveneva, teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘suttanāmaka’’nti nāmaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ.
tika-s0402t34:18_4: Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ ‘‘sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā’’ti, tadapi natthi, yasmā sahatāññena.
tika-s0402t34:18_6: Sahabhāvo nāma atthato aññena hoti, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi, yo ‘‘saha gāthāhī’’ti vucceyya, na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi.
tika-s0402t34:18_8: ‘‘ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṁ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā’’ti, tadapi na, aññato.
tika-s0402t34:18_9: Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0402t34:18_11: Evaṁ suttādīnaṁ aṅgānaṁ aññamaññaṁ saṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t34:18_12: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṁvaṇṇanāya sāratthadīpaniyā (sārattha. ṭī.
tika-s0402t34:19_0: Na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotīti aṭṭhakathāñca pāḷiñca jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṁ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno na hotīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t34:19_1: Tenevāha ‘‘na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā…pe…
tika-s0402t34:22_2: Vinayaṁ upetāti tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṁ vinayaṁ upetā.
tika-s0402t34:22_3: Vesārajjenāti sārajjakarānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṁ vigamanato vesārajjena, sārajjarahitenāti attho.
tika-s0402t34:22_5: Tameva pariyattidhammaṁ dhārenti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṁ viya vinassantaṁ akatvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena hadaye ṭhapentīti dhammadharā.
tika-s0402t34:22_6: Edisā ca attanā sutassa dhammassa ādhārabhūtā nāma hontīti āha ‘‘sutadhammānaṁ ādhārabhūtā’’ti.
tika-s0402t34:25_1: Aṭṭhame byāmohavasena saraṇapariyesanaṁ sārajjanaṁ sārado, byāmohabhayaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:25_2: Vigato sārado etassāti visārado, tassa bhāvo vesārajjaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:25_3: Taṁ pana ñāṇasampadaṁ, pahānasampadaṁ, desanāvisesasampadaṁ khemañca nissāya pavattaṁ catubbidhapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:25_6: Sabbaññutapaṭijānanavasena abhimukhaṁ gacchanti, aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā, pubbabuddhā.
tika-s0402t34:25_7: Idaṁ panāti buddhānaṁ ṭhānaṁ sabbaññutameva vadati.
tika-s0402t34:25_8: Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0402t34:26_0: Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti ‘‘abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ, sāriputta, anekasataṁ khattiyaparisaṁ upasaṅkamitā…pe…
tika-s0402t34:26_1: brāhmaṇaparisaṁ gahapatiparisaṁ, samaṇaparisaṁ, cātumahārājikaparisaṁ, tāvatiṁsaparisaṁ, māraparisaṁ, brahmaparisaṁ upasaṅkamitā, tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpajjitapubbā.
tika-s0402t34:26_2: Tatra vata maṁ ‘bhayaṁ vā sārajjaṁ vā okkamissatī’ti nimittametaṁ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī’’ti (ma. ni.
tika-s0402t34:26_4: Abhītanādaṁ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena visārado ahanti abhītanādaṁ nadati.
tika-s0402t34:27_1: 4.31) suttasesena sappurisūpanissayādiphalasampattipavatti vuttā, purimasappurisūpanissayādiupanissayā pacchimasappurisūpanissayādisampattipavatti vā vuttā.
tika-s0402t34:27_2: Ādi-saddena tattha ca cakkasaddassa gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:27_4: Uracakkādīsūti ādi-saddena āṇāsamūhādīsupi cakkasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t34:28_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṁ paṭivedhoti ‘‘phalakkhaṇe uppannaṁ nāmā’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:28_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti ‘‘aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe…
tika-s0402t34:28_3: Tato paraṁ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:29_1: Vacanamattameva hi tesaṁ, na pana dassanaṁ tādisasseva dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0402t34:29_2: Bhagavato eva vā ‘‘ime dhammā anabhisambuddho’’ti parassa vacanavasena dassitadhammesu.
tika-s0402t34:29_5: Hetūti ca upapattisādhanahetu veditabbo, na kārako, sampāpako vā.
tika-s0402t34:29_7: Tattha codako codanaṁ karotīti kāraṇaṁ, dhammo codanaṁ karoti etenāti kāraṇaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:30_0: Antarāyo etesaṁ atthi, antarāye vā niyuttāti antarāyikā.
tika-s0402t34:30_1: Evaṁbhūtā pana te yasmā antarāyakarā nāma honti, tasmā āha ‘‘antarāyaṁ karontīti antarāyikā’’ti.
tika-s0402t34:30_2: Asañcicca vītikkame nātisāvajjāti katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘sañcicca vītikkantā’’ti.
tika-s0402t34:30_3: Satta āpattikkhandhātiādi nidassanamattaṁ itaresampi catunnaṁ ‘‘antarāyikā’’ti vuttadhammānaṁ tabbhāve byabhicārābhāvato.
tika-s0402t34:30_4: Idha pana methunadhammo adhippetoti idaṁ aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttaṁ ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṁ (pāci.
tika-s0402t34:30_6: Yasmā taṁkhaṇampi kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ disvā virato hoti ce, visesaṁ adhigacchati, na kāmesu āsatto, tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘methuna…pe…antarāyo hotī’’ti.
tika-s0402t34:30_7: Tattha yassa kassacīti na kevalaṁ pabbajitasseva, atha kho yassa kassaci.
tika-s0402t34:30_8: Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘methunamanuyuttassa, mussatevāpi sāsana’’nti (su. ni. 820).
tika-s0402t34:32_3: Puthūhi vā sitāti bahūhi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi sitā upanibaddhā.
tika-s0402t34:35_1: Navame bhavati etena ārogyanti bhavo, gilānapaccayo.
tika-s0402t34:35_3: Vuddhiattho hi ayamakāro yathā ‘‘saṁvarāsaṁvaro, phalāphala’’nti ca.
tika-s0402t34:35_5: Sappinavanītādiggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṁ, sabbassapi gilānapaccayassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t34:35_6: Bhavābhavoti vā khuddako ceva mahanto ca upapattibhavo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t34:36_1: Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṁ tasitaṁ sattaṁ assāsadassanavasena sahāyakiccaṁ karontī bhavādīsu anibbinnaṁ katvā paribbhamāpeti.
tika-s0402t34:36_2: Tathā hi taṁ papātakaṁ acintetvā madhuggaṇhanakaluddakā viya anekādīnavākulesu bhavesu ānisaṁsameva dassentī anatthajāle sā paribbhamāpeti, tasmā taṇhā ‘‘purisassa dutiyā’’ti vuttā.
tika-s0402t34:36_4: Saccametaṁ, na pana tathā visesapaccayo, yathā taṇhā.
tika-s0402t34:36_5: Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā akusalehi, kāmāvacarādikusalehi ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesapaccayo.
tika-s0402t34:36_7: Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo, so etassa atthīti itthabhāvaññathābhāvo, saṁsāro, taṁ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:36_8: Tattha itthabhāvo manussattaṁ, aññathābhāvo tato avasiṭṭhasattāvāsā.
tika-s0402t34:36_9: Itthabhāvo vā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ paccuppanno attabhāvo, aññathābhāvo anāgatattabhāvo.
tika-s0402t34:36_10: Evarūpo vā aññopi attabhāvo itthabhāvo, na evarūpo aññathābhāvo.
tika-s0402t34:36_11: Tenevāha ‘‘itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṁ attabhāvo’’tiādi.
tika-s0402t34:38_2: 2.95 apasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.60; a. ni. aṭṭha. 2.4.199; dha. sa. aṭṭha.
tika-s0402t34:38_4: 226 saṅkhārapadaniddeso; su. ni. aṭṭha. 2.523; udā. aṭṭha. 39; itivu. aṭṭha. 14);
tika-s0402t34:39_0: Tenāha ‘‘khandhadhātuāyatanānaṁ paṭipāṭi’’nti, khandhadhātuāyatanānaṁ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparappavattinti attho.
tika-s0402t34:40_0: Evamādīnavaṁñatvāti ettha etamādīnavaṁ ñatvātipi paṭhanti, etaṁ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavaṁ samudayaṁ taṇhaṁ ādīnavaṁ ñatvāti attho.
tika-s0402t34:40_1: Atha vā evamādīnavaṁ ñatvāti etaṁ yathāvuttaṁ saṁsārānativattanaādīnavaṁ dosaṁ ñatvā.
tika-s0402t34:40_2: Niggahaṇoti caturūpādānasaṅkhātassa sabbassa gahaṇassa paṭinissajjanena niggahaṇo, khandhaparinibbānena saṅkhārappavattito apagaccheyyāti evaṁ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t34:43_1: Dasame yojentīti kammaṁ vipākena bhavādiṁ, bhavantarādīhi dukkhena sattaṁ yojenti ghaṭentīti yogā.
tika-s0402t34:43_2: Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena yogo cāti kāmayogo.
tika-s0402t34:43_4: Tattha paṭhamo upapattibhavesu rāgo, dutiyo kammabhavesu, tatiyo bhavadiṭṭhisahagato yathā rajjanaṭṭhena rāgo, evaṁ yujjanaṭṭhena yogoti vutto.
tika-s0402t34:43_5: Catūsu saccesu aññāṇanti idaṁ suttantanayaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:44_0: Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo paccayasamudayo ca.
tika-s0402t34:44_2: Samudayate samudayanaṁ samudayo, samudeti etasmāti samudayoti evaṁ ubhinnaṁ samudayānaṁ saddatthatopi bhedo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t34:44_3: Paccayasamudayaṁ pajānantopi bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṁ pajānāti, khaṇikasamudayaṁ pajānantopi paccayasamudayaṁ pajānāti.
tika-s0402t34:44_4: Paccayato hi saṅkhārānaṁ udayaṁ passato khaṇato ca nesaṁ udayadassanaṁ sukhaṁ hoti, khaṇato ca nesaṁ udayaṁ passato pageva paccayānaṁ suggahitattā paccayato dassanaṁ sukhena ijjhati.
tika-s0402t34:44_5: Idha pana khaṇikasamudayaṁ dassento āha ‘‘samudayanti uppatti’’nti.
tika-s0402t34:45_3: Tadubhayaṁ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena passato aññataradassanena itaradassanampi siddhameva hoti.
tika-s0402t34:45_4: Pubbabhāgeyeva ārammaṇavasena khayato vayato sammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṁ passanto byatirekavasena anussavādito accantatthaṅgamaṁ passati, maggakkhaṇe pana ārammaṇato accantatthaṅgamaṁ passanto asammohato itarampi passati.
tika-s0402t34:45_5: Idha pana bhedatthaṅgamaṁ dassento āha ‘‘atthaṅgamanti bheda’’nti.
tika-s0402t34:45_6: Kāmānaṁ uppattibhedaggahaṇeneva cettha yathā kāmānaṁ paṭiccasamuppannatā vibhāvitā, evaṁ kāmavatthunopīti ubhayesampi aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:45_7: Madhurabhāvanti iminā kāmasannissitaṁ sukhaṁ somanassaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0402t34:45_8: ‘‘Yaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ kāmānaṁ assādo’’ti (ma. ni.
tika-s0402t34:45_10: Amadhurabhāvanti iminā pana kāmahetukaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0402t34:46_2: Punabbhavakaraṇaṁ punobhavo uttarapadalopena, mano-saddassa viya ca purimapadassa okārantatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t34:46_4: Atha vā sīlatthena ikasaddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakasaddassa adassanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ yathā apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko.
tika-s0402t34:46_5: Atha vā punabbhavaṁ denti, punabbhavāya saṁvattanti, punappunabbhave nibbattentīti ponobhavikā.
tika-s0402t34:46_6: ‘‘Taddhitā’’ti hi bahuvacananiddesā vicittattā vā taddhitānaṁ abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā ‘‘punabbhavaṁ dentī’’tiādīsupi atthesu ponobhavikasaddasiddhi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t34:47_0: Visaṁyojenti paṭipannaṁ puggalaṁ kāmayogādito viyojentīti visaṁyogā, asubhajjhānādīni visaṁyojanakāraṇāni.
